title: Australian diary. No. 011
creator_credit: Jack S. Allan and Australian National Film Board
brief_description: The desert is the setting for Australian boom town Whyalla, showing its development as a port and shipbuilding centre. Stars show their artistry at the ice carnival in Sydney. The Public Library of New South Wales is considered everyman’s university, and the collections of books, manuscripts and paintings are examined.
